wordGroup: figure skater 花样滑冰运动员

sentences.en: Wu is now known as a highly talented skater.
sentences.cn: 吴现在被认为是一名极具天赋的滑冰运动员。

sentences.en: The skater executed a perfect set of figures.
sentences.cn: 那个滑冰的人做出了一套完美的花样动作。

sentences.en: Ranked third in the world in May 2010, 19-year-old Asada is Japan's top ice skater.
sentences.cn: 2010年3月的世界排名第三，使19岁的浅田真央成了日本最好的花滑选手。
